deleteStrategy.title: Are you sure you would like to delete your strategy?
deleteStrategy.content1: All data on the strategy will be deleted. It will be impossible to restore them.
deleteStrategy.content2: All funds will be withdrawn to your wallet

pauseStrategy.title: Are you sure you would like to pause your strategy?
pauseStrategy.content: This will prevent your strategy from being traded against, however you will retain access to any associated funds.

tooltips.buy: This section indicates the details to which you are willing to buy {{token}} at. When a trader interact with your buy order, it will fill up your 'Sell' order with tokens.
tooltips.sell: This section indicates the details to which you are willing to sell {{token}} at. When a trader interact with your sell order, it will fill up your 'Buy' order with tokens.
tooltips.buyPrice: This is the price in which you are willing to buy {{token}}.
tooltips.sellPrice: This is the price in which you are willing to sell {{token}}.
tooltips.buyBudget: This is the available amount of {{sellToken}} tokens that you are willing to use in order to buy {{buyToken}}.
tooltips.sellBudget: This is the available amount of {{token}} tokens that you are willing to sell.
tooltips.active: Your strategy is active and ready
tooltips.noBudget: Your strategy has no associated funds. Consider depositing funds to activate it.
tooltips.paused: Your strategy is currently paused. Edit the prices to activate it.
tooltips.inactive: Your strategy is currently inactive. Consider activating it with funds and rates.

notification.title: Strategy Notification
notification.content1: You can set a notification to be informed each time someone trades against your strategy.
notification.content2: This is a third-party service managed by
